attributes.action: Force Piers Morgan to support any team other than Arsenal Football Club
attributes.additional_details:
Due to his incessant tweets taunting opposition fans and then criticising Arsenal football club and then trying to be 'matey' with the players he criticises, please it be made illegal for Piers Morgan to comment, visit or support Arsenal Football Club.

I don't know which powers the Government has here, but as it often does what it likes, the least it can do is ban Piers Morgan.

He is also embarrassing the UK in America on a weekly basis.
